title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful dish made with tender chicken pieces simmered in a spicy curry sauce.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.

title: ice-cream
summary: A sweet, frozen dessert made from dairy or non-dairy ingredients, often flavored and served in scoops or cones.
